attributes.action: introduce a study into basic UK politics for children in school years 10 and 11
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request pupils in years 10 and 11 to be given some lessons in politics in respect to - political ideologies, parties, legislative process, parliament, voting and pressure groups.

When it comes to voting, how can the public be expected to make informed political descisions, without having some background knowledge to support them. We believe that by teaching this as part of a students 'Personal, social, health and economic education,' democracy in the UK will be strengthened.
